data.title: On the variation operator for the Ornstein–Uhlenbeck semigroup in dimension one
data.sourcetitle: Annali di Matematica Pura ed Applicata
data.abstract: Consider the variation seminorm of the Ornstein–Uhlenbeck semigroup Ht in dimension one, taken with respect to t. We show that this seminorm defines an operator of weak type (1, 1) for the relevant Gaussian measure. The analogous Lp estimates for 1 < p< ∞ were already known.
data.keywords: Mehler kernel, Ornstein–Uhlenbeck semigroup, Variation seminorm
